register.name: SWRST
register.group: System Reset and Interrupt Control Registers

register.name: SYSCR
register.group: System Reset and Interrupt Control Registers

register.name: DCPLB_STATUS
register.description: Data Cache Programmable Look-Aside Buffer Status

register.name: DCPLB_FAULT_ADDR
register.description: Data Cache Programmable Look-Aside Buffer Fault Address

register.name: ICPLB_STATUS
register.description: Instruction Cache Programmable Look-Aside Buffer Status

register.name: ICPLB_FAULT_ADDR
register.description: Instruction Cache Programmable Look-Aside Buffer Fault Address

register.name: USB_INTRTX
register.description: Interrupt register for endpoint 0 and Tx endpoint 1 to 7

register.name: USB_INTRRX
register.description: Interrupt register for Rx endpoints 1 to 7

register.name: USB_INTRUSB
register.description: Interrupt register for common USB interrupts

register.name: USB_INDEX
register.description: Index register for selecting the indexed endpoint registers

register.name: USB_GLOBINTR
register.description: Global Interrupt Mask register and Wakeup Exception Interrupt

register.name: USB_GLOBAL_CTL
register.description: Global Clock Control for the core

register.name: USB_TX_MAX_PACKET
register.description: Maximum packet size for Host Tx endpoint

register.name: USB_CSR0
register.description: Control Status register for endpoint 0 and Control Status register for Host Tx endpoint

register.name: USB_TXCSR
register.description: Control Status register for endpoint 0 and Control Status register for Host Tx endpoint

register.name: USB_RX_MAX_PACKET
register.description: Maximum packet size for Host Rx endpoint

register.name: USB_RXCSR
register.description: Control Status register for Host Rx endpoint

register.name: USB_COUNT0
register.description: Number of bytes received in endpoint 0 FIFO and Number of bytes received in Host Tx endpoint

register.name: USB_RXCOUNT
register.description: Number of bytes received in endpoint 0 FIFO and Number of bytes received in Host Tx endpoint

register.name: USB_TXTYPE
register.description: Sets the transaction protocol and peripheral endpoint number for the Host Tx endpoint

register.name: USB_NAKLIMIT0
register.description: Sets the NAK response timeout on Endpoint 0 and on Bulk transfers for Host Tx endpoint

register.name: USB_TXINTERVAL
register.description: Sets the NAK response timeout on Endpoint 0 and on Bulk transfers for Host Tx endpoint

register.name: USB_RXTYPE
register.description: Sets the transaction protocol and peripheral endpoint number for the Host Rx endpoint

register.name: USB_RXINTERVAL
register.description: Sets the polling interval for Interrupt and Isochronous transfers or the NAK response timeout on Bulk transfers

register.name: USB_TXCOUNT
register.description: Number of bytes to be written to the selected endpoint Tx FIFO

register.name: USB_LINKINFO
register.description: Enables programming of some PHY-side delays

register.name: USB_VPLEN
register.description: Determines duration of VBUS pulse for VBUS charging

register.name: USB_APHY_CNTRL
register.description: Register that increases visibility of Analog PHY

register.name: USB_APHY_CALIB
register.description: Register used to set some calibration values

register.name: USB_APHY_CNTRL2
register.description: Register used to prevent re-enumeration once Moab goes into hibernate mode

register.name: USB_PHY_TEST
register.description: Used for reducing simulation time and simplifies FIFO testability

register.name: USB_PLLOSC_CTRL
register.description: Used to program different parameters for USB PLL and Oscillator

register.name: USB_SRP_CLKDIV
register.description: Used to program clock divide value for the clock fed to the SRP detection logic

register.name: USB_EP_NI0_TXMAXP

register.name: USB_EP_NI0_RXMAXP
register.description: Maximum packet size for Host Rx endpoint0

register.name: USB_EP_NI0_RXCSR

register.name: USB_EP_NI0_RXCOUNT
register.description: Number of bytes received in endpoint 0 FIFO

register.name: USB_EP_NI0_TXTYPE
register.description: Sets the transaction protocol and peripheral endpoint number for the Host Tx endpoint0

register.name: USB_EP_NI0_TXINTERVAL
register.description: Sets the NAK response timeout on Endpoint 0

register.name: USB_EP_NI0_RXTYPE
register.description: Sets the transaction protocol and peripheral endpoint number for the Host Rx endpoint0

register.name: USB_EP_NI0_RXINTERVAL
register.description: Sets the polling interval for Interrupt/Isochronous transfers or the NAK response timeout on Bulk transfers for Host Rx endpoint0

register.name: USB_EP_NI0_TXCOUNT
register.description: Number of bytes to be written to the endpoint0 Tx FIFO

register.name: USB_DMA_INTERRUPT
register.description: Indicates pending interrupts for the DMA channels

register.name: USB_DMA0_ADDRLOW
register.description: Lower 16-bits of memory source/destination address for DMA master channel 0

register.name: USB_DMA0_ADDRHIGH
register.description: Upper 16-bits of memory source/destination address for DMA master channel 0

register.name: USB_DMA0_COUNTLOW
register.description: Lower 16-bits of byte count of DMA transfer for DMA master channel 0

register.name: USB_DMA0_COUNTHIGH
register.description: Upper 16-bits of byte count of DMA transfer for DMA master channel 0
